parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3 </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>0.70</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Unit Inventory </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Collects all loaded [[magazines]] from all [[secondaryWeapon]] muzzles and returns them in [[Array]], otherwise it returns []. This command is used for infantry weapons only. </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''secondaryWeaponMagazine''' unit </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>


</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> unit: [[Object]]  </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Array]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value> 


</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[hint]] [[str]] [[secondaryWeaponMagazine]] [[player]]; //["NLAW_F"]
</code></value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>_array <ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>=</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext> [[secondaryWeaponMagazine]] [[player]];
[[if]] ([[count]] _array > 0) [[then]] {
	[[hint]] ("Secondary weapon is loaded with " + (_array [[select]] 0) + "!");
} [[else]] {
	[[if]] ([[secondaryWeapon]] [[player]] != "") [[then]] {
		[[hint]] "Secondary weapon is not loaded!";
	} [[else]] {
		[[hint]] "Player doesn't have a secondary weapon!";
	};
};
</code></value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE2</name>=<value>

____________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[secondaryWeapon]], [[secondaryWeaponItems]], [[addSecondaryWeaponItem]], [[primaryWeaponMagazine]], [[handgunMagazine]], [[binocularMagazine]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name index="7"/><value>  </value></part><part><name>MPBEHAVIOUR</name>=<value> 
____________________________________________________________________________
</value></part></template>
